mewa sama ja virodi unath meweni kantawantath jevath wenna nitiyen awasara diya yutui mokda mewa eda budungege kle sita pewata ena ewa nisaya me ahinsaka genunge pahasa labanneth loku loku polis kukko ha loku mudalali nisa ungen hari hmba kragsttanam aulak ne 
eth mewata nitiyen vetabadinawata wada nitiyen awsara deema kalochitwa sidda viya yutu deyaki ehema awasara tibenam eka samajayta pililayakda nowanneya unge neti beri kam hindath pitimin e ahinsaka genu etenta denmu nisathya un e job ekata hutu une ekata dos negiya yutte kalakanni pirimintamaya e wagema obath mewa loku kra pennimen obath hoyanne jeewath weemata mudalya enisa deke wenasak nr neda?aneka obath gehaniyakage kusen melowata bihi unu pirimiyek wasayen kantawan atini mevenisamaja vitodi  dewal una kiya eka mulumahath lokayatama penna penna karana weda satahanda samaja virodiya eken asarana wenneth ape ratema ahinsaka kantawoya mewa salli hoyanna pennuwata mlli min matu mewage ewa penna nna epa meka mulu mahath kamta parapuratama krana agaurwayak mewata path unu kantawange jeevite etul pette eti sochaniya katawa kebaduda kiya vimasa bala ita piliyam kla heki weta satahan kra etulin oun in galawagena sukita mudita krima kotram manussathwen kla hekideyakda ? mnussakamim mewa diha blanna mewage pahath vidio ekak dala eken oba kiyak hri hoyan obe daruwanta genunta kanna denna epa mlli eka loku papayak weradi nokaranno loke sitinam e gollo gena deyak hoya krnna e genu wage obath meweni vidiyo tulin kranuye samajayata blawath weraddaki mewa nopenniya yutui mewa polosi mgin samaja maddiya jala walata beda herima nokala yutui lokaye diyunu kisidu rataka meweni de prasiddiye samajayata muda nohariti eken hire giya aya samajayata muhuna dee unge athmema vinasa klama keseda jiviteta dewanuwa muhuna denne enisa mea nitiyen alla nitiya klata kari neta meweni samajala tulin ounge mulu athmema vinasa kirima blawath waradaki manawa aitin ullangane kirimaki manawa himikam sanvidana ho kantawan surakeeme sanvidana mewa diha bala bakan nobala noida meweni samaja jala walin kantawanta me karana balawath asadarane venuwenuth munta viruddawa nopamawa peni sitina men karunawen illa sitimi
